home.heroDescription: See how grades convert to bonus points across global grading systems. Save and track progress for each child when you create a free account.
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to create a transparent and motivating reward system for academic achievement
home.feature1Desc: Real-time calculation based on grades with customizable factors for class level, term type, and subject importance
home.feature2Desc: Support for multiple grading systems (A-F, 1-6, percentages) and languages - perfect for families anywhere
home.feature3Desc: Visual analytics and historical tracking to celebrate improvements and identify areas for growth
home.feature4Desc: Separate accounts for parents and children with appropriate permissions and privacy controls
home.feature5Desc: GDPR and COPPA compliant with encryption, secure authentication, and complete data privacy
home.feature6Desc: Works on all devices - install on your phone, tablet, or desktop with offline capability
home.benefit1Desc: Children understand exactly how their efforts translate into rewards, creating clear goals and motivation
home.benefit2Desc: Adjust bonus factors to match your family values and your child’s unique learning journey
home.benefit3Desc: Track progress over time, identify strengths and weaknesses, and celebrate improvements together
home.benefit4Desc: Built with child safety in mind, COPPA and GDPR compliant with parental controls and privacy protection
home.benefit5Desc: Turn academic achievements into lasting value — set aside all or part of earned rewards into savings plans, junior depot accounts, or ETF savings programs. Help children see the long-term impact of their efforts while building healthy financial habits early.
home.freeCoreFeatures: Free core features for every family, with Pro upgrades on the way
home.ctaDescription: Join families worldwide who are using Bonifatus to celebrate academic achievement and build positive learning habits
home.footerDescription: Empowering families to celebrate academic achievement through transparent, motivating rewards.
home.demoSectionSubtitle: Explore now; save results when you sign up.
home.growthTitle: What If Their Grades Built Real Wealth?
home.growthSubtitle: Invest your child's bonus points into savings or ETFs. Even small, regular contributions can grow significantly over time through compound returns.
home.growthAssumption: Based on {rate}% average annual return (e.g. MSCI World ETF historical average)

auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Sign in to your account
auth.agreeBySignIn: By signing in, you agree to our
auth.agreeByCreate: By creating an account, you agree to our
auth.sentCode: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to
auth.codeResent: Verification code resent! Check your email.
auth.enterEmailForReset: Enter your email to receive a password reset code
auth.enterCodeAndPassword: Enter the code sent to your email and choose a new password
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.botProtectionNotConfigured: Bot protection is not configured. Please try again later.
auth.pleaseCheckBox: Please check the box to verify you are not a robot.
auth.verifyingNotRobot: Verifying you are not a robot...
auth.securityCheck: Performing a security check... this may take up to a minute.
auth.securityFailed: Security verification failed. Please check the box and try again.
auth.securityRefresh: Security verification failed. Please refresh the page.
auth.botProtectionUnavailable: Bot protection is unavailable. You can still sign in.
auth.reVerifying: Re-verifying you are not a robot...
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters
auth.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
auth.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
auth.passwordSpecial: Password must contain a special character
auth.dobRequired: Please provide the date of birth.
auth.dobInvalid: Date of birth looks incorrect. Age must be between 5 and 150.
auth.accountCreatedEmailFailed: Account created! However, we had trouble sending the verification email. Please use the "Resend" button on the next screen.

calculator.gradingSystemTooltip: The grading scale used by your school. Different countries use different systems.
calculator.classLevelTooltip: The grade/year level of the student (1-13).
calculator.termTypeTooltip: The type of grading period. Final terms have higher bonus multipliers.
calculator.termNameTooltip: Optional name for this term (e.g., Spring, Fall).
calculator.subject: Subject
calculator.subjectTooltip: Select a subject from the list. Type to filter.
calculator.gradeTooltip: The grade received for this subject.
calculator.weightTooltip: Subject weight for average calculation. Default is 1.
calculator.demoMode: Demo mode. Sign in to save this calculation to a profile.
calculator.draftRestored: Restored your last draft. Saving will clear it.
calculator.savedAsDefault: Saved as your default grading system
calculator.pickSubjects: Please pick subjects from the list so we can save them.
calculator.formula: Formula: class level × term factor × grade factor (best=2, second=1, third=0, below=-1), floored at zero.
calculator.addSubjectsToSee: Add subjects and grades to see the calculation.
calculator.couldNotStoreDefault: Could not store your default preference in this browser.

settings.title: Settings
settings.planDescription: Core calculator, progress tracking, and family connections

student.title: Calculator, results, insights
student.description: Run calculations, save terms, and track your progress over years and terms.
student.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.
student.savedResultsDesc: Filter by year and term to review or edit.
student.noSavedResults: No saved results for this filter. Run a calculation and save it.
student.addResultsForTrends: Add results to see trends and comparisons.
student.noRecentTerms: No terms saved yet. Start by running a calculation!
student.calculatorDesc: Calculate bonus points for your grades across any grading system.
student.savedDesc: Review, edit, or delete your saved term results.
student.insightsDesc: Visual analytics and trends across all your saved grades.
student.keepSaving: Keep saving terms to see your trend!
student.recentSettlements: Ask your parent to settle rewards in the parent dashboard.

studentProfile.title: Manage connections
studentProfile.description: Enter a 6-digit code from your parent to link accounts. You can remove the connection at any time.
studentProfile.scanInstructions: Point your camera at the QR code to capture the invite. Grant camera permission if prompted.
studentProfile.scanError: Could not read QR. Try again or enter the code manually.
studentProfile.linkedSuccess: Linked! Your parent can now view your results.

parent.title: Dashboard
parent.description: See which children are linked to your account. If no one is connected yet, share a 6-digit code or QR for them to join.
parent.noChildren: No children are linked yet. Generate a 6-digit invite code and share it to get started.
parent.shareCode: Share this 6-digit code with your child. It expires {date}.
parent.generateCodeOrQr: Generate a code or QR to quickly link a child. They can enter the code on their profile page.
parent.step1: Tap Generate code to create a 6-digit invite.
parent.step2: Share the code or QR with your child.
parent.step3: The child opens their Profile & Connections page and enters the code.
parent.step4: Once linked, you can see their saved test results here.
parent.connectionRequired: A connection is required to view grades and insights for a child.
parent.insightsDesc: Analytics and comparisons across all your children.
parent.noInsightsData: Connect children and wait for them to save grades to see insights.
parent.rewardsDesc: Configure bonus point values and settle rewards with your children.
parent.pointValueDesc: Set how much each bonus point is worth in real money.
parent.payoutCashDesc: Settle in person with pocket money or a treat.
parent.payoutBankDesc: Transfer to your child's bank account.
parent.payoutVoucherDesc: Buy a gift card from popular stores.
parent.payoutSavingsDesc: Save for their future in a dedicated account.
parent.payoutInvestDesc: Even small regular investments can grow significantly over time through compound returns.
parent.splitPayoutDesc: Divide the reward across multiple methods.
parent.noSettlements: No settlements yet. Start by settling your child's earned bonus points!
parent.marketDisclaimer: Data delayed. For educational purposes only. Not financial advice.
parent.investCta: Interested in investing your child's rewards?

privacy.transparent: Be transparent about our data practices
